column2: "What, you think you can take your Hunter mojo to a whole other level?"
"Well, you're gonna have to prove it to me. I mean, that's what the mutual evaluation system's all about, right?"
"The test is plain and simple. All you've got to do is take down the target hostiles with the weapon I specify."
"Remember, no fear, ever. And always stay cool. Now, go nail that test. I'll be waiting for your report."
